body_content.explanation: (of a computer image, etc.) based on a rectangular grid (= pattern of lines and columns) of pixels (= small dots):
examples: PNG is a graphics file format for raster images.
The digitized raster file was imported into the computer and displayed on the display monitor screen as an image.
A raster image is also known as a bitmap and is created from rows of small dots which are called pixels ("picture elements") or "bits".
